uiDefinition.description: The Api Key for this API
uiDefinition.tooltip: Provide your Api Key - get this key from https://cloudmersive.com

properties.description: Cloudmersive Video and Media Connector is critical for converting, editing, resizing, moderating and processing video, audio and other media.  Cloudmersive Video and Media Services covers a wide array of common video and audio processing needs, including encoding, decoding, editing, resizing, moderating and extracting metadata.  Stateless high-security processing ensures fast performance and strong security.
